items.sentence: Do you think Cookie would be a good name for a dog?
Tom is the one who suggested that I read this book.
Tom should be able to solve the problem by himself.
Tom is the only boy that Mary invited to her party.
Tom pretended he understood, even though he didn't.
It seems to me that Tom is afraid of Mary's mother.
I hope we didn't make you feel uncomfortable today.
I can't leave the house until my mother comes back.
Tom suffers from PTSD and is plagued by nightmares.
Have you noticed any changes in your hair or nails?
